name: Backcountry Access Stealth 330 Probe
description: Burly enough to stand up to the demands of professional use and deep snowpacks, the Stealth 330 is free of the dangling pull-cable found on other probes. In its place, there’s a tube nested into the first probe section. It makes it smaller in your pack, and quick to deploy: just pull the trigger and the probe extends to its full 330cm.Laser-etched depth markings are easy to read and highly resistant to wear.Tip penetrates debris easily.
